constraints.name: tree_growth_rule
constraints.description: 树的生长规则：在每一步中，选择深度最小的叶节点，并将其替换为当前树的副本。
constraints.formal: T_i = T_{i-1} with v (the shallowest leaf) replaced by T_{i-1}

constraints.name: depth_min_leaf
constraints.description: 计算满足条件的最小天数，使得树中深度最小的叶节点深度大于给定值 d。
constraints.formal: S_d = min(i) such that depth of the shallowest leaf in T_i > d
